****Description for [name]*******: name of the current running project; only [name] will be used, [name1] and others are just for record to switch easily
name: training_perfect_pixOL
****Description for [comet]*******: your account at wwww.comet.ml, a website for in-live plotting the training/testing results
****Description for [arch]*******: choise of the neural network archtechture; Deep-SMOLM use the neural network archtecture built in [model/model.py]
****Description for [optimizer]*******: choice of the optimization for neural network
****Description for [parameters2 below]*: parameters of the microscopy; [pixel_sz_org]: pixel size of original input image; [upsampling_ratio]: upsampling_ratio of Deep-SMOLM
****Description for [parameters3 below]*: [upsampling_ratio]: upsampling_ratio of Deep-SMOLM output images compared to input images; [I_thresh]: photons lower than I_thred is filtered out in the posterprocessing algorithm
****Description for [Trainer]*******: [epochs]:maximum epochs; [save_dir]: the position where trained model/estimation results are sved
****Description for [data_loader]*******: change the [batch_size] and [num_workers] based on your GPU memory and CPU cores
****Description for [training_dataset]**: Please download the example training data at @OSF
****Description for [est_dataset]*******: Please download the example estimation data at @OSF
****Description for [est_dataset_experim: Please download the example experimental estimation data at @OSF
